Header.title: We are Sunrise Construction
Header.paragraph: Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipiscing elit. Duis sed dapibus leo nec ornare diam sed commodo nibh ante facilisis bibendum.

About.paragraph: At Sunrise Construction, our mission is to redefine excellence in construction on the Outer Banks of North Carolina. Founded in 2023, we stand as a beacon of innovation and commitment, bridging the gap in the market for a medium-sized construction company that prioritizes exceptional craftsmanship, superior customer service, and transparent communication. Our dedicated team, at Sunrise Construction, is driven by a passion for delivering projects that not only meet but exceed our clients' expectations. With a focus on quality, integrity, and collaboration, we embark on every construction endeavor, ensuring that the structures we build not only withstand the test of time but become integral parts of the vibrant Outer Banks community. At Sunrise Construction, we don't just construct buildings; we create enduring partnerships and contribute to the lasting beauty of the coastal landscape.

Services.name: Roofing
Services.text: We have a team of experienced roofing professionals ready to handle any reroofing project. Whether it's a small repair or a complete replacement, we ensure the highest quality materials and workmanship every step of the way.

Services.name: Windows
Services.text: Upgrade your properties windows with our top of the line window replacement services. By choosing energy efficient windows you not only enhance the aesthetic appeal but also improve insulation and potentially reduce energy costs.

Services.name: Siding
Services.text: Enhance the appearance and protection of your properties with that expert siding installation services. The offer of a variety of siding options and not your unique style and preferences providing long lasting durability and beauty

Services.name: Repairs
Services.text: From minor fixes to significant repairs, we have the skills and knowledge to handle all types of exterior repairs. Our team promptly addresses issues, ensuring your properties always look their best and are structurally sound

Services.name: Waterproofing
Services.text: At sunrise we consider ourselves experts in waterproofing. Our techniques and materials are designed to protect your properties from water damage, preventing costly repairs in the future.

Services.name: Drone Inspection
Services.text: We go the extra mile is providing A comprehensive assessment of your properties. Our drone fleet allows us to conduct full exterior inspections, capturing detailed images and identifying potential issues.
